title: Spacious 2 bed & 1 bath Capitol Hill Apartment
posting_body: ['Welcome to 1800 Boylston Ave located in the heart of Capitol Hill!', 'This cozy and spacious 2nd floor condo with 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom features gleaming hardwood floors, a well designed kitchen with granite counters and all stainless appliances, a wood fireplace, tiled bathroom and washer/dryer in the unit and one parking spot!', 'Steps away from shops, restaurants, parks, and light rail.', 'Modern city living in one of the top neighborhoods in Seattle.', 'Just a 3 minute car ride to Amazon and downtown Seattle!', 'Easy access to I-5, Swedish Hospital, University of Washington, Seattle University and just one block from Light Rail Station!', 'Microsoft Connector/Shuttle within 5 blocks.', 'With a walk score of 98 you have the city at your doorstep in your own private oasis!', 'All utilities and high speed internet included except electricity.', 'One parking spot in the underground secure garage.', 'Sorry, no smoking and small pets ok.', 'Furnished or unfinished.', 'First and last.', '$500 damage deposit.', 'Minimum 6 month lease.', 'Credit check.']
